[[inst_v_shfli_up]]
==== V.SHFLI.UP

*Syntax:* v.shfli.up SrcL.<T>, SrcR.<T>, imm, ->Dst.<W>

*Description:* Shuffle (up): permutes vector elements using immediate indices.
